title: Fonte da Pipa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Portuguese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small tapas bar with several vegan choices such as soy steaks, tofu steaks, seitan steaks, soy sausages, Mediterranean burger, some of which have egg or dairy but all ingredients are listed. Just ask to omit unwanted ingredients or pick a purely vegan item.
